about.title: About H&M Group
about.intro: H&M Group is one of the world's leading fashion companies. In addition to H&M, the group includes & Other Stories, COS, Cheap Monday, Monki, Weekday, and H&M Home. All H&M products are unique in their identity and united by their passion and vision for fashion, always striving to ensure quality and sustainability for customers.
about.fashionDesc: It all started with a single women's clothing store in Västerås, Sweden, in 1947. Today, H&M Group has many fashion brands and a strong global presence. We have expanded through our online sites and new stores in markets everywhere. Our mission is to provide high-quality fashion accessible to as many people as possible.
about.missionDesc: We always strive to offer the best sustainable fashion to our customers, and our employees' commitment is a key factor in our success. To achieve success, we always work to create a better future for fashion and use our market capabilities to foster an ideal fashion industry worldwide.
about.whoDesc: H&M Group has more than 161,000 employees from different nationalities and backgrounds around the world, all dedicated to creating the best offers and shopping experiences for customers. At H&M, we share a value-based way of working, built on respect for the customer. Our shared values help create an open, dynamic, and accessible company culture for everyone.
about.stats1: H&M Group hired 13,000 new employees in 2016, bringing the team to 161,000 employees.
about.stats2: H&M Group sales including VAT reached 223 billion SEK in 2016.
about.stats3: We have 43 online markets and over 4,500 stores in 69 markets.
about.didYouKnow1: 96% of the electricity we used in 2016 came from renewable sources.
about.didYouKnow2: We reduced greenhouse gas emissions by 47% in 2016.
about.didYouKnow3: We helped create about 1.6 million job opportunities for people working with our suppliers in the textile sector.
about.didYouKnow4: Our stores have collected more than 55,000 tons of clothing since 2013 for reuse and recycling.

hmDescription: H&M’s business idea is to offer fashion and quality at the best price. Since its founding in 1947, H&M has grown into one of the world’s leading fashion companies.
